description: Detects process LSASS memory dump using Mimikatz, NanoDump, Invoke-Mimikatz, Procdump or Taskmgr based on the CallTrace pointing to ntdll.dll, dbghelp.dll or dbgcore.dll for win10, server2016 and up.
false_positives: False positives are present when looking for 0x1410. Exclusions may be required.
name: LSASS Memory Dump
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:(*0x1038* OR *0x1438* OR *0x143a*) AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:(*dbghelp.dll* OR *dbgcore.dll* OR *ntdll.dll*)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*|C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2\-agent\\* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*\\thor\\thor64.exe\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*|UNKNOWN\(* AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:"0x103800") OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Sysmon64.exe"))))
author: Samir Bousseaden
Michael Haag
